alert.note: Alert for Boone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 6:14AM CDT until March 30 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Boone County in north central Arkansas... * Until 645 AM CDT. * At 613 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Roberson Hollow to 7 miles southwest of Omaha to Carrollton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Diamond City... Lead Hill... Omaha... Myrtle... Roberson Hollow... Self... Willis... Alpena... Crumpler Subdivision... South Lead Hill... Bear Creek Springs... New Hope in Boone County... Hopewell in Boone County... Ridgeway... Burlington... Bull Shoals Lake... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.
